feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • DF-428 - Making user properties pane collapsible by @ananthu-kurup in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/801
  • remove conditional render circular progress by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/810
  • webhook editor autoselect instead of textfield by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/811
  • document webhooks by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/812

New Contributors

  • @ananthu-kurup made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/801

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix type errors in events table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/819

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.1...v0.13.2

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • clickhouse client fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/820
  • more granular postgres connection options by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/821

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.2...v0.13.3

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • more descriptive /api/public/apps docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/827
  • event entry journeys can't be started from segment signals by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/828

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.3...v0.13.4

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.13.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • address partial segment updates by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/829

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.13.4...v0.13.5
